title: nIkE daya raavalera
sahitya:
nIkE daya rAvelarA kOdaNDapANi

anupallavi

 nIkE daya rAlEdu nI kaNTE vErE lEdu rAkEndu vadana shrI rAma dayAnidhE

caraNam 1

 kamala nEtruDavani kalyANa guNuDavani vimala mAnasamuna vinutincucunta nApai 
paripari vidhamula prastutincina gAni palukavEmi nAtO palumAru pilacina
 
caraNam 2

 kOrina kOrkelella konasAga sEtuvani kOri vEDitinayya kOdaNDapANI nApai 
itara daivamulanu patimAlalE nika patita pAvanuDani madilOna sharaNaNTi
 
caraNam 3

 nIvE nA daivamani niratamu nammiyuNTi kAvavE IvELa karuNAjaladhE nApai 
rAmacandrapura ramaNIya nilaya shrI rAmadAsa mAnasa rAjIva hamsa
